article: My name is Bill. I'm an English boy. I'm a student  _  a high school . I'm in Class 4, Grade 8. Li Lei is my friend. We are in  the same  class. He is thirteen. Here is a photo of  _  family. It is new. Please  look at  it. His dad is  _  English teacher. The one  in red  is his mom. She is a doctor . He has  _  sisters. Their names  _  Fangfang and Lingling. They look the same. They are high school students,  _  . They  _  a nice cat. They like it very much.
